import React from "react" const DynaudioDS = { title: 'WebGL Registration', client: 'Tomorrow China / Dynaudio', media: [ '/media/digital-solutions/dynaudio/recording.mp4', '/media/digital-solutions/dynaudio/start.jpg', '/media/digital-solutions/dynaudio/register.jpg' ], body:

In conjunction with Dynaudio X Christopher performance event, we created an interactive H5 that allow interested guest to sign up online and participate in the mini-interactivity.

Integrating Javascriptâ€™s WebGL API into H5, we are able to render interactive 2D/3D graphics without any external plug-ins to display within the mobile browser.

The experience extends to the event day whereby registered participants will have to display a personalised QR code for on-site check-in.

 } export default DynaudioDS
